name: Floppa Life | UPDATE 0.9
description:
How To Play: First Click Your Floppa For Money. Make Sure Your Floppas Health Is Not At 0 Or It Will Die. Buy Upgrades For Your Floppa. And Try To Make Your Floppa As Old As Possible
